input.sentences: i spent the day catching up with some old classmates .

output.sentences: The classmates decided to spend the day together.
They started their day on the playground and played with the kids.
They had fund acting like kids again.
The group hung around the park most of the day.
The classmates enjoyed each other so much they talked late into the night.
